Data Analytics

Data Analytics for Public Data (2021 Fall) (3)
Exploratory Data Analysis (2021 Spring) [in Korean] (8)

Analysis 3: Analysis of the FWA in public sector organizations using data mining techniques [in Korean]

Data Analytics for Public Data (2021 Fall)
Sophisticated policy design is required for the public sector flexible work arrangement(FWA) to achieve the original purpose of work-family balance. In addition, the use of FWA due to external pressure (such as department evaluation of penalizing for not choosing to use FWA) rather reduces the adoption rate in a long-term perspective (i.e. stigmatization or psychological issue). Therefore, it is necessary to design a meticulous personnel system that facilitates the adoption through both psychological and material incentives.
Dec 20, 2021
Sangwon Ju, SNU GSPA

Analysis 2: Unemployment index

Data Analytics for Public Data (2021 Fall)
Most important part in the unemployment index analysis is how specific figures were calculated, how the definition of the ‘unemployment’ was constructed, and how the data were surveyed and acquired.
Dec 15, 2021
Sangwon Ju, SNU GSPA

Analysis 1: Number of local government employees

Data Analytics for Public Data (2021 Fall)
The number of local government employees in 2020 decreased by 9.5% (compared to 2018) and 13.32 % (compared to 2019) by on average. This decrease was transitory, since it was affected by The Transition of Fire Officials to National Position (2020).
Dec 1, 2021
Sangwon Ju, SNU GSPA
